description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. You have travelled to the oldest part of the known world where once the Xkoden - the founder race - lived in a great city ruled by the majestic Spell Masters.   Called to the village of Kern by your old teacher you must gather the ingredients for your spells, defeat a corrupt and powerful foe, and save the world from an ancient evil.  To accomplish all this you must become a Spell Master.
description.short: You have travelled to the oldest part of the known world where once the Xkoden - the founder race - lived in a great city ruled by the majestic Spell Masters. To accomplish all this you must become a Spell Master.
